actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-947.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 265 - 141 (Record Vote No: 430).

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on the bill (H.R.  4116) to extend and improve the Domestic Volunteer Service Act of 1973, and against the consideration of such conference report.

summary.text: Waives points of order against the conference report on H.R. 4116 (domestic volunteer service programs) and against its consideration.

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on the bill (H.R.  4116) to extend and improve the Domestic Volunteer Service Act of 1973, and against the consideration of such conference report.
